author: Cortex XSOAR

automation.description: Highlight words inside a given text.
automation.name: HighlightWords

automation.description: Common code that will be merged into each server script when it runs.
automation.name: CommonServer

automation.description: Finds a threshold for ML model, and performs an evaluation based on it.
automation.name: GetMLModelEvaluation

automation.description: Parse Sane-json-reports and export them as docx files (used internally).
automation.name: SaneDocReports

automation.description: Parse Sane-json-reports and export them as pdf files (used internally).
automation.name: SanePdfReports

automation.description: Predict text label using a pre-trained machine learning phishing model, and get the most important words used in the classification decision.
automation.name: DBotPredictPhishingWords

automation.description: Gets a list of indicator objects and the associated indicator outputs that match the specified query and filters. The results are returned in a structured data file.
automation.name: GetIndicatorsByQuery

automation.description: Check if a docker image is available for performing docker pull. Script simulates the docker pull flow but doesn't actually pull the image. Returns an entry with 'ok' if all is good otherwise will return an error.
automation.name: CheckDockerImageAvailable

automation.description: This automation allows to delete a relationship between indicator objects based on the relationship id.
automation.name: DeleteIndicatorRelationships

automation.description:
Gets a list of incident objects and the associated incident outputs that
match the specified query and filters. The results are returned in a structured data file.

This automation runs using the default Limited User role, unless you explicitly change the permissions.
For more information, see the section about permissions here:
- For Cortex XSOAR 6 see https://docs-cortex.paloaltonetworks.com/r/Cortex-XSOAR/6.x/Cortex-XSOAR-Playbook-Design-Guide/Automations 
- For Cortex XSOAR 8 Cloud see https://docs-cortex.paloaltonetworks.com/r/Cortex-XSOAR/8/Cortex-XSOAR-Cloud-Documentation/Create-a-script
- For Cortex XSOAR 8.7 On-prem see https://docs-cortex.paloaltonetworks.com/r/Cortex-XSOAR/8.7/Cortex-XSOAR-On-prem-Documentation/Create-a-script
automation.name: GetIncidentsByQuery

automation.description:
Finds past similar incidents based on incident fields' similarity. Includes an option to also display indicators similarity.
Note: For the similarity calculation, at least one field must be provided in one of the "similarTextField", "similarCategoricalField", or "similarJsonField" arguments.
automation.name: DBotFindSimilarIncidents

automation.description: Common code that will be merged into each PowerShell script/integration when it runs.
automation.name: CommonServerPowerShell

automation.description: Create a phishing classifier using machine learning technique, based on email content.
automation.name: DBotBuildPhishingClassifier

automation.description: This automation outputs the indicator relationships to context according to the provided query, using the entities, entityTypes, and relationships arguments. All arguments will use the AND operator. For example, using the following arguments entities=8.8.8.8 entities_types=Domain will provide only relationships that the 8.8.8.8 indicator has with indicators of type domain.
automation.name: SearchIndicatorRelationships

automation.description: Finds similar incidents based on indicators' similarity. Indicators' contribution to the final score is based on their scarcity.
automation.name: DBotFindSimilarIncidentsByIndicators

automation.description:
Deprecated. Use DBotFindSimilarIncidents instead.
Find similar incidents by text comparison - the algorithm based on TF-IDF method.
To read more about this method: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tf%E2%80%93idf

This automation runs using the default Limited User role, unless you explicitly
change the permissions.
For more information, see the section about permissions here:
- For Cortex XSOAR 6 see https://docs-cortex.paloaltonetworks.com/r/Cortex-XSOAR/6.x/Cortex-XSOAR-Playbook-Design-Guide/Automations 
- For Cortex XSOAR 8 Cloud see https://docs-cortex.paloaltonetworks.com/r/Cortex-XSOAR/8/Cortex-XSOAR-Cloud-Documentation/Create-a-script
- For Cortex XSOAR 8.7 On-prem see https://docs-cortex.paloaltonetworks.com/r/Cortex-XSOAR/8.7/Cortex-XSOAR-On-prem-Documentation/Create-a-script
automation.name: FindSimilarIncidentsByText

automation.description: Deprecated. No available replacement. Collect telemetry data from the environment.
automation.name: DBotMLFetchData

automation.description: Runs validation and linting using the Demisto SDK on content items, such as integrations, automations and content packs. This automation script is used as part of the content validation that runs as part of the contribution flow.
automation.name: ValidateContent

automation.description: Deprecated. No available replacement. Suggests a classifier mapping based on an advanced name matching algorithm.
automation.name: DBotSuggestClassifierMapping

automation.description:
This script helps organizes and groups incidents based on their similarities using clustering algorithms.
Clustering is a technique used to group data points (in this case, incidents) that are similar to each other into clusters.
Used to automatically categorize a large number of incidents into meaningful groups.
automation.name: DBotTrainClustering

automation.description: Show clustering model information - model summary and incidents in specific cluster.
automation.name: DBotShowClusteringModelInfo

automation.description: Draw incidents and indicators on the canvas to map and visualize their connections.
automation.name: DrawRelatedIncidentsCanvas

automation.description: Parse STIX files to Cortex XSOAR indicators by clicking the **Upload STIX File** button.
automation.name: StixParser

automation.description: This automation creates a relationship between indicator objects.
automation.name: CreateIndicatorRelationship

automation.description: Train a machine learning text classifier.
automation.name: DBotTrainTextClassifierV2

automation.description: Deprecated. Use DBotPreProcessTextData instead.
automation.name: WordTokenizerNLP

automation.description: Common code that will be merged into each server script when it runs.
automation.name: CommonServerPython

automation.description: Pre-process text data for the machine learning text classifier.
automation.name: DBotPreProcessTextData

description: The base pack for Cortex XSOAR.
name: Base
